Description: A subtitle for the language settings that shows when the player is in an expedition. The language settings is disabled in expeditions and can only be changed in the Main Menu.

French.Translation: Impossible de changer la langue durant l'expédition.

Italian.Translation: Impossibile cambiare la lingua durante una spedizione

German.Translation: Sprache kann nicht während einer Expedition geändert werden

Spanish.Translation: No se puede modificar el idioma en la expedición

Russian.Translation: Невозможно изменить язык во время экспедиции

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Impossível mudar o idioma durante a expedição

Polish.Translation: Nie można zmienić języka w trakcie ekspedycji

Japanese.Translation: エクスペディション中は言語を変更できません

Korean.Translation: 탐사 중 언어를 변경할 수 없습니다

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 任务期间无法更改语言

name: MainMenu.Settings.Language_Subtitle_InExpedition
